pmtables 0.2.0
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Add row and column spacing information to st object

st_space.Rd

See the row_space and col_space arguments to stable().

st_space(x, row = 1.5, col = 5)

Arguments

x

an stobject
row

set row_space, passed to stable()
col

set col_space, passed to stable()

Examples

library(dplyr)

ob <- st_new(ptdata())

ob %>% st_space(row = 1) %>% st_make()
#>  [1] "\\setlength{\\tabcolsep}{5pt} "                                             
#>  [2] "\\begin{threeparttable}"                                                    
#>  [3] "\\renewcommand{\\arraystretch}{1}"                                          
#>  [4] "\\begin{tabular}[h]{lllllllll}"                                             
#>  [5] "\\hline"                                                                    
#>  [6] "STUDY & DOSE & FORM & N & WT & CRCL & AGE & ALB & SCR \\\\"                 
#>  [7] "\\hline"

#> [10] "12-DEMO-001 & 150 mg & tablet & 48 & 81.7 & 104 & 34.4 & 3.83 & 0.910 \\\\" 
#> [11] "12-DEMO-001 & 150 mg & troche & 16 & 94.0 & 93.2 & 27.4 & 4.94 & 1.25 \\\\"
